biography_text: SPANO, Ross, a Representative from Florida; born in Tampa, Hillsborough County, Fla., July 16, 1966; graduated from Brandon High School, Brandon, Fla., 1984; B.A., University of Florida, Gainesville, Fla., 1994; J.D., Florida State University, Tallahassee, Fla., 1998; lawyer, private practice; member of the Florida state house of representatives, 2012-2018; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Sixteenth Congress (January 3, 2019-present).
